channel.title: Server Starting up
channel.description:
[b]Hello al,
Im verry new to this kind of coding so here is my problem.
I downloaded NO-IP,Utorrent, Client,Base I did forward my port, and if clik on Startserver it starts, it displays : SERVER ONLINE. Wel then i go to the moparscape client. i give al the information ( ****.no-ip.org) Then i get the error : Failing to connect to the server.
I edited the client and the base. i did change the IP in all maps.
Can somone pleas help me with my problem
Im running on source 317 [/b]

item.title: Server Starting up
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

Change the IP to 0.0.0.0.

If you want other people to join send then the client with your No-Ip domain, and then use the client with the IP 0.0.0.0 for your self.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Starting up
item.dc:creator: @flyingbimbo flyingbimbo
item.description:
@flyingbimbo wrote:

[b]I use the One-Scape client.
Even with de loader no 1 cant connect.

If i try to connect with moparclient it says this

Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 13,2332,3678 - 80,111,105,110,116,115,58,32,48,32,10,76,-59,[/b]

Read full topic

item.title: Server Starting up
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

The moparscape client is not compatible with quite a few sources. The sources out now should come with their own client. If not search for one.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Starting up
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“flyingbimbo, post:5, topic:406497”][b]If i do that it works. but only for me.

The last time i tried my friend did get up for like 2-3 seconds and then he get automatic kick :s[/b][/quote]
Why not find a better source that comes with it’s own client?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Starting up
item.dc:creator: @stefano1911 stefano1911
item.description:
@stefano1911 wrote:

  1. why use moparscape client it sucks…

  2. the ports are the same in server/client?

atleast try if it work with ip: 127.0.0.1 if that doesnt work it basicly means thats somethig wrong with client ip/port or server ip/port…

Read full topic
